00001 #include "../port.h"
00007 #ifndef VECTOR_H
00008 #define VECTOR_H
00009 // Global includes
00010 #include <math.h>
00011 
00018 class cVector {
00019         public:
00020                 cVector() {x=0;y=0;}
00021                 cVector(double x,double y) {this->x = x; this->y = y;}
00022                 cVector(const cVector &b) {x = b.x; y=b.y; }
00023                 
00024                 // Vector assignation
00025                 cVector &operator =(const cVector& b) {x=b.x; y=b.y; return *this;}
00026                 
00027                 // Vector comparison
00028                 // ==: Double equality
00029                 // <=: X (left) equality
00030                 // >=: Y (right) equality
00031                 // !=: Neither equality
00032                 bool operator == (cVector b) {return(x==b.x && y==b.y);}
00033                 bool operator <= (cVector b) {return(x==b.x);}
00034                 bool operator >= (cVector b) {return(y==b.y);}
00035                 bool operator != (cVector b) {return(x!=b.x && y!=b.y);}
00036                 
00037                 // Difference operators
00038                 bool operator <= (double x) {return this->x==x;}
00039                 bool operator >= (double y) {return this->y==y;}
00040                 
00041                 // Vector operations
00042                 // Includes multiplication and division, dot product is own function
00043                 cVector operator + (const cVector &b)    { return(cVector(x+b.x,y+b.y)); }
00044                 cVector operator - (const cVector &b)    { return(cVector(x-b.x,y-b.y)); }
00045                 cVector operator * (const cVector &b)    { return(cVector(x*b.x,y*b.y)); }
00046                 cVector operator / (const cVector &b)    { return(cVector(x/b.x,y/b.y)); }
00047                 cVector operator * (const double &b)     { return(cVector(x*b,y*b)); }
00048                 cVector operator / (const double &b)     { return(cVector(x/b,y/b)); }
00049                 cVector operator - (void)               { return(cVector(-x,-y)); }
00050                 double operator ~ ()                    { return(sqrt(x*x+y*y)); }
00051                 double dot(const cVector &b)             { return(x*b.x+y*b.y); }
00052                 double cross(const cVector &b)           { return(x*b.y-y*b.x); }
00053                 
00055                 cVector norm(void)                      { double len = sqrt(x*x+y*y); return(cVector(x/len,y/len)); }
00056                 
00057                 cVector snorm(void);
00058                 
00060                 cVector normal(void)                    { return (cVector(-y,x)); }
00061                 //cVector get_negnorm(void);
00062                 
00063                 // Extended vector operations
00064                 void operator += (const cVector &b)  { x+=b.x;y+=b.y; }
00065                 void operator -= (const cVector &b)  { x-=b.x;y-=b.y; }
00066                 void operator *= (const cVector &b)  { x*=b.x;y*=b.y; }
00067                 void operator /= (const cVector &b)  { x/=b.x;y/=b.y; }
00068                 void operator *= (const double &d)   { x*=d;y*=d; }
00069                 void operator /= (const double &d)   { x/=d;y/=d; }
00070                 
00071                 // Special functions
00072                 cVector rotatenorm(const cVector  &b);
00073                 cVector rot(const cVector  &b);
00074                 cVector unrot(const cVector &b);
00075                 cVector swap(void)                  { return(cVector(y,x)); }
00076                 double angle(cVector &b)             { return atan2(-(b.y-y),(b.x-y))-M_PI/2.0; }
00077                 
00078                 double x,y;
00079 };
00080 
00081 #endif
